tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
When my mother was advised to undergo an abdominal hysterectomy due to a large fibroid, we were overwhelmed with anxiety and confusion. The recommendation came following a sonography and we were left unsure about the next steps.

Our journey took a turn for the better when we consulted Dr. Nileshma on July 10, 2024. From the very beginning, Dr. Nileshma 's approach was both reassuring and thorough. She patiently explained the entire procedure, addressed our concerns, and provided clear guidance on what to expect. Her positivity and calm demeanor were incredibly comforting, giving my mother the confidence to proceed with the surgery promptly.

The procedure involved the successful removal of the uterus along with the large fibroid through Laproscopy by Dr Nileshma.

We are deeply grateful for Dr. Nileshma

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I want to convey my wholehearted gratitude to Dr Nileshma pandey who is a exceptional gynecologist, renowned for his expertise, compassion, and dedication to women's health. His commitment to providing personalized care *** *** ********* ********* ** *** ***** make her a trusted and highly respected professional.We are fortunate to get a doctor like her. Whenever I have faced any difficulties or health related queries Dr Nileshma always guided me throughout my 9 months of pregnancy journey.My wife'sdelivery was done as Normal delivery inspit of high risk pregnancy. I think for normal delivery she is best gynecologist in this area. I really like her gesture.Thanks a lot Ma'am for giving us all support throughout this 9 month journey & for such a precious gift of our life.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a great experience with Dr. Nileshma. 
We came to know about her through our family doctor and I am happy to share that from the very first consultation it became evident that I was in good hands. 
She is so kind and patient. She explained things in a way that was easy to understand and made sure I had all the information that I needed to make informed decisions about my health. She treats all her patients like a family member and gives all great advises with a big smile. 

Thank you ma‚Äôam for all your advices and the genuine care throughout. 

Highly recommended.

Regards, 
Diksha

review: Dr. Nileshma Pandey is not only a very experienced *** ************* gynecologist but also an extremely empathetic person. After meeting Ma'am for the first time we understood that we were in the best hands. Not only has Ma'am listened to all our concerns with patience and treated us with utmost care, she has also counselled me whenever I have shared any of my problems with her. She is extremely approachable and has attended late night calls on multiple occasions when we were faced with an emergency and ensured that we received all medical help and care on hospitalization. Ma'am goes beyond her call of duty to ensure that her patients are always well attended and get all the support they require. We have been lucky to have been under Nileshma Ma'am's supervision and we look forward to all our upcoming interactions with Ma'am. May God bless you Ma'am for the care and support that you extend to your patients. Thank you Ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** **** ****** *** ***** ***** * **** **** **** Dr.Nileshma pandey is a gem in this medical world who listens to her patient, genuinely cares for them, and is extremely empathetic. Her advice is golden and directed toward the benefit of her patient (both financially and personal well-being). We were blessed with a baby boy and for these 9 months, she was always there for us. Her ratings and reviews here are from people like us who have witnessed her hard work and quick response. I am grateful for her help and it's my honor to write something for her (this is the least I can do for her). I remember, I called her at midnight and she was there to take the call. She loves her work and never creates a burden on your pocket. Not even a single message or call or advice went unheard. She always responded quickly on WhatsApp for these 9 months. She is a talented gift from God and I wish her all the success, happiness, and love of this world.
Love & Blessings from a happy Mother who is writing this . Thank you so much
Ma'amüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Nileshma Pandey as my doctor. Madam is a nice person with patience and good behaviour that can not be expressed in words. She is one such doctor who picks up our phone calls anytime even if in the late night in case of emergencies. If she fails to receive the calls, she usually calls back. Which is a very rare characteristic of the doctors, now a days. I always get amazed by seeing her prescriptions where she writes every details of the disease, symptoms, key test findings, and advises. She always explains every details of the disease and moreover she answers all of our questions, even if they are the silly ones. This is the way she essentially boosts our confidence. Recently she did my wife's delivery. She was extremely careful and I recovered within a week. A lot of thanks to madam. She is the best. The biggest thing about her treatment is that a patients gets half-cured by her wonderful behaviour. Madam, please take immense care of yourself and obviously the patient's like us as well. In summary Nileshma Maam is one of the best doctor I have ever seen.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Uterine Bleeding,Advanced Laparoscopic Surgery,Adenomyosis Treatment,Endometriosis Treatment,Uterus Removal Surgery,
review: I was suffering from severe endometriosis and adenomysis with fibroids since 2001 consultated almost all top hospitals and doctors for treatment however did not cure at the end I met with Dr Nileshma Pandey and she suggests for uterus and ovary removal as this problem taking my peace of life. Surgery done successfully, she is very calm, intelligent soft spoken person, understand well of her patients problem and resolve the issues in a very gentle and careful manner. Highly recommended. After operation also she made sure ,all if and but queries resolved with smile. Her friendly behavior make you comfortable to go ahead. I am happy and content to select Dr Nileshma Pandey for my surgery. All went well.

*** ******** ****** ** *** ***** ************* ** **** My wife was always be comfortable to discuss her problems with her and she has also treated her with ease of mind. The great thing, she is always available in case of emergency. Due to Corona19 we were not able to go her clinic but she scheduled our consultancies on call for few days which is really good. I highly recommended Dr. Nileshma Pandey.
